title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Surprising news or a sudden realization can instantaneously transform your thinking. Even minor attempts to rearrange your mental furniture stir up powerful feelings today. The rebellious Moon-Uranus conjunction shocks your 9th House of Truth, inspiring you to quickly reject anything or anyone who appears to tie you to lies or misconceptions. Take time to digest whatever information you learn because there might still be additional insights waiting to surface. Naturally, its wise to hold all the best cards you can before actively playing your hand. Steve Aitchison wrote, Honesty has a power few people can handle. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
